translated: The cessation of the six sense bases stops contact. The cessation of contact stops sensation. The cessation of sensation stops craving. The cessation of craving stops appropriation. original: 'gag pa'i rim pa de la sogs pa 'gag pa ni rnam par zhig pa yin par 'dod na ni des na rgyu rnam par zhig pa las 'bras bu rnam par zhig pa yin par khas blangs pa'i phyir skad cig ma 'jig pa la gnod par 'gyur ro zhes

translated: If you assert that the cessation of the sequence of cessation is the disintegration of cessation, then you accept that the result disintegrates from the disintegration of the cause, and thus you undermine the disintegration of momentary states.

original: bya ba ni ma rig pa ni 'du byed kyi rgyu yin te /
